news.title: White House hits back at reports Trump named in Epstein files
news.summary: It came as a US judge denied a justice department's bid to unseal Florida court files on Epstein.

news.title: Universities are 'failing us' on mental health, say students - but should it really be up to them?
news.summary: The number of students reporting mental health concerns is rising. But to what extent should the onus be on universities?

news.title: Just 7,000 steps a day cuts health risks,   study says
news.summary: Everyone targets 10,000 steps - but a lower tally could reduce the risk of serious health issues like cancer, dementia and heart disease, a study suggests.

news.title: Assistant who accused Kanye West of sexual assault 'in hiding', lawyer says
news.summary: The rapper, now known as Ye, has denied all her claims and says they are "fantasy fiction".

news.title: Thousands of river pollution tests cancelled because of staff shortages
news.summary: Testing programmes affected include those monitoring the impact of drought.

news.title: Tories must 'offer hope' unlike Reform, Badenoch says
news.summary: The Conservative Party leader said Argentinian President Javier Milei was the "template" for her leadership.

news.title: Columbia University to pay $200m in settlement with Trump administration
news.summary: The New York college becomes the first to agree to pay the Trump administration after it was investigated over campus antisemitism.

news.title: As porn sites apply new age checks, will users hand over personal ID?
news.summary: All websites hosting pornography will have to check the age of their users from Friday.

news.title: The Papers: 'Crushing cancer treatment delays' and '4-star asylum fiasco'
news.summary: Doctors' strikes and concerns over immigration feature on Thursday's front pages.

news.title: City rate-rigging convictions quashed - what happens next?
news.summary: Carlo Palombo and Tom Hayes have secured victory after a 10-year fight but what are the next steps for the former traders?
